name: Woodsman Clicker
description:
This game made for Clicker Jam 2022

Creators:

Daimon: 3D artist and environment design

Mergen: Game Developer

Try to become Wood King and leave forest for the city. Start with the collecting brushes with your hand to cut big trees with chainsaw. Also dont forget to upgrade your gears.

Controls:

WASD : Movement

Left Click: Collect

Q/E : Turn

P: Pause Menu

Escape: Close the upgrade shop
